issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] DefaultPhysicalPlanner should insert explicit MergeExec nodes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9838](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9838). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Operators such as GlobalLimitExec, SortExec, and HashAggregateExec (in some cases) require a single input partition. Rather than have these operators perform their own merging of input partitions, the planner should insert explicit MergeExec nodes into the physical plan, when needed.
